DECLARATION.P1: By applying for the Master's program at Eastern International University, I hereby commit to fulfilling the following academic, research, and financial obligations upon admission:
DECLARATION.L1: Strictly comply with the Master's Degree Training Regulations and all other regulations of Eastern International University;
DECLARATION.L2: Ensure sufficient time for study and research, attend all scientific activities, participate in activities organized by professional departments, and strictly follow the University's study and research plans;
DECLARATION.L3: Pay tuition and other fees in accordance with the University's regulations;
DECLARATION.L4: Authorize Eastern International University to use my certificate and diploma information for verification purposes.
DECLARATION.P2: I solemnly declare that the information provided in this application is true and correct. I accept full legal responsibility for any false statements.
DECLARATION.AGREE: I agree to the terms and conditions above.
